reg_pit.title: National Instrument 43-101 Standards of Disclosure for Mineral Projects

change.changenote: Section 1.1 definition of "initial deposit period" was added by BC Reg 106/2016, effective May 9, 2016.
Section 4.2 (5) (a) (ii) BEFORE amended by BC Reg 106/2016, effective May 9, 2016.

bcl:subparagraph.bcl:text: if the disclosure is also contained in a directors' circular, the earlier of 45 days after the date of the disclosure and 3 business days before expiry of the take-over bid; and

change.changenote: Section 6.4 (1) (b) BEFORE amended by BC Reg 139/2023, effective June 9, 2023.

bcl:paragraph.bcl:text: limits the use or publication of the report in a manner that interferes with the issuer's obligation to reproduce the report by filing it on SEDAR.
